info.title: Free Dictionary API
info.description: A Free Dictionary API providing structured multilingual dictionary data sourced from Wiktionary under Creative Commons licensing, useful for looking up word definitions, synonyms, and linguistic information.

get.description:
Retrieves dictionary entries for a specified word for a specific language or all available
languages.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description:
ISO 639-1/639-3 (2 or 3 letter) language code for word lookup, or "all" to retrieve
entries across all available languages.

parameters.name: translations
parameters.description: Whether to include translations of the word to other languages.

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: Whether to pretty-print the JSON response.

EntriesByLanguageAndWord.title: EntriesByLanguageAndWord
EntriesByLanguageAndWord.description: A collection of dictionary entries for a word in different languages.

entries.description: All dictionary entries for this word in different languages and contexts.

source.description: Information about where this data comes from and how it can be used.

allOf.description: Information about where this data comes from and how it can be used.

Entry.title: Entry
Entry.description: A dictionary entry for a word in one specific language.

language.description: Which language this entry is for.

allOf.description: Which language this entry is for.

partOfSpeech.description: What type of word this is (noun, verb, adjective, etc.).

forms.description: Different forms of this word (like plural, past tense).

senses.description: All the different meanings of this word.

synonyms.description: Words that mean the same thing as this word (for the whole entry).

antonyms.description: Words that mean the opposite of this word (for the whole entry).

Form.title: Form
Form.description: A different form of the word (like plural, past tense, etc.).

word.description: The different form of this word.

tags.description: Labels describing what kind of form this is (plural, past tense, etc.).

name.description: The full name of this language in English.

License.title: License
License.description: Legal terms for using the dictionary data.

url.description: Link to read the full license terms.

Pronunciation.title: Pronunciation
Pronunciation.description: How to pronounce a word using phonetic symbols.

text.description: The pronunciation written in the specified notation.

tags.description: Labels describing this pronunciation (like dialect or formality level).

Quote.title: Quote
Quote.description: A quote from a book or other source showing how the word is used.

reference.description: Where this quote came from (book title, author, etc.).

Sense.title: Sense
Sense.description: One specific meaning of a word with examples and related information.

definition.description: What this meaning of the word means.

tags.description: Labels about how this meaning is used (formal, old-fashioned, technical, etc.).

examples.description: Example sentences showing how to use this meaning.

quotes.description: Real quotes from books or other sources using this word.

synonyms.description: Words that mean the same as this specific meaning.

antonyms.description: Words that mean the opposite of this specific meaning.

translations.description: How to say this meaning in other languages.

subsenses.description: More specific meanings within this meaning.

Source.title: Source
Source.description: Information about where the dictionary data comes from.

url.description: Link to the original Wiktionary page.

license.description: Legal information about how you can use this data.

allOf.description: Legal information about how you can use this data.

Translation.title: Translation
Translation.description: How to say a word in another language.

language.description: Which language this translation is in.

allOf.description: Which language this translation is in.

word.description: The word or phrase in that language.
